Name: MPI_ORDER_FORTRAN
Description: MPI_ORDER_FORTRAN indicates that the memory storage order to apply in that of FORTRAN; column-major order. That is, consecutive elements in memory are that of the leftmost dimension in arrays. It is used for instance in routines like MPI_Type_create_subarray and MPI_Type_create_darray. The other memory storage order is MPI_ORDER_C.
